channel.title: Weirdest Problem
channel.description:
Ok I've just encountered quite possibly the strangest thing that's happening to my server.
At certain times of the day, "dwarf remains" appear on the floor, and they keep increasing by 2. When 500 Dwarf remains are dropped on the floor, the server crashes. Here's a picture to explain what I mean : (Look also at the number 500)
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2a7suc8.jpg[/img]
Edit : Apparently it's because Dwarf Remains our a null, which means I will need to replace the model..
Anyone got the ID of what I'm suppose to be replacing? Or is it the ID of Dwarf remains?

item.title: Weirdest Problem
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

just don’t replace anything just use it how you got it.

Read full topic
